89b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston
89b3('dul ba): pa lags so/ / ston pa lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// 'od srungs de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'od srungs pa ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no//
89b4('dul ba): khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srungs nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srungs khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng
89b5('dul ba): rgyas 'od srungs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/
89b6('dul ba): dge sbyong chen po ni lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la mi spyod kyi/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can nyid dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyod do snyam
89b7('dul ba): mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po po zo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gzugs la skye ba yang yod/ 'jig pa
90a1('dul ba): yang yod de/ de'i skye ba dang 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal ba chen po tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba 'ang
90a2('dul ba): yod/ 'jig pa yang yod de/ de'i skye ba dang 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po rnon po rigs kyi bus gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/ gzugs de'o//
90a3('dul ba): su shes so// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/ rnam par shes pa
90a4('dul ba): de yongs su shes so/ / rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes na/ gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/
90a5('dul ba): mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su shes na/ bdag gam bdag gir
90a6('dul ba): khas mi lenA/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/
90a7('dul ba): lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed na/ tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bu tshor ba dang / 'dra
90b1('dul ba): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed na/ tshad med cing grangs
90b2('dul ba): med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o/ / de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te gzugs bdag ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
90b3('dul ba): dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin na/ 'o na bdag sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ gso ba po 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes
90b4('dul ba): sam shed bu 'am/ byed pa po 'am/ byed du 'jug pa po'am/ shes pa po 'am/ kun nas shes pa po 'am/ spong ba po 'am/ kun nas slong ba po 'am/ smra ba po
90b5('dul ba): 'am tshor ba po 'am/ kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa nam yang ma byung / 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / da lta yang yod pa ma yin na/ gang gis de dang der dge ba dang sdig pa'i las
90b6('dul ba): byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing / gang gis phung po 'di bor te/ phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas
90b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag padag ces bya ba ni byis pa so so'i
91a1('dul ba): skye bo zos dang mi ldan pas btags pa'i rjes su lhung ba yin te/ 'di la bdag ce'am bdag gi med kyi/ dge slong dag skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing // 'gag
91a2('dul ba): ba na yang sdug bsngal 'gag go/ / skye ba na 'du byed rnams skye zhing / 'gag pa na 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'du byed
91a3('dul ba): kyi rgyud 'jug go/ / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi rgyud nying mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chud nas sems can gyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'dogs par mdzad de/ dge slong dag ngas
91a4('dul ba): lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa ma'i las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / dman pa dang / gya nom pa dang /
91a5('dul ba): bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang gzigs so// las ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus
91a6('dul ba): kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang log par lta ba yin te/ log par lta ba'i las dang chos blangs/

98a1('dul ba): gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhon nur gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa de la/ kun dga'i rab me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun

98a7('dul ba): phrogs so/ / khyim bdag de snying na zhing skyed mos tshal de la lhag par chags pas shi nas de nyid kyi sbrul gdug pa zhig tu skyes te/ de rgyal po la rgyun du glags tshol ba lhur len cing gnas
98b1('dul ba): so/ / ji tsam na rgyal po gzugs can snying po so ga'i dus la bab ste/ me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus pa na btsun mo dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal der zhugs nas/ de de na skyes pa med
98b2('dul ba): par rol mos btsun mo'i bud med dang lhan cig dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid log go/ / bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas/ kun tu 'khyab du dong ngo //
98b3('dul ba): bud med gcig gis ral gri bskur te/ rgyal po bsrung du bcug go// de nas sbrul gdug pa des rgyal po'i drung na sgra mi grag par rig nas/ rgyal po la gzung ba'i phyir tshang nas byung ste
98b4('dul ba): chas so/ / rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi mthus bya ka lan ta ka zhes bya ba de rnams kyis sbrul gdug pa de kun nas bskor nas tsa ci'i sgra phyung ngo // bud med ral gri thogs pas thos nas
98b5('dul ba): spangs te sgra chen po phyung nas ral gris bsad do/ / de nas rgyal po yang spangs te sad nas smras pa/ 'di ci byung / bud med des smras pa/ lha sprul gdug pa 'di lnga la gzung ba'i phyir
98b6('dul ba): chas pa na/ bya ka lan ta ka rnams kyis tsa tsi'i sgra phyung nas/ bdag gis bkum lags so// rgyal po'i gnas skabs de gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / khrom gyi ru ba dang /
98b7('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis thos nas/ skyed mos tshal de'i phyi nang du ku co'i sgra chen pos gang bar gyur te/ rgyal po de skye dgu la byams pa zhig pas
99a1('dul ba): phyir zhing btsun mo skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas te mig mchi mas gang zhing 'khod do/ / de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dab
99a2('dul ba): bskur ba la srog skyob pa de la mchog ci sbyin/ skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal srid kyi phyed do// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag bya kA lan tA ka rnams kyis nga'i srog byin
99a3('dul ba): pas rgyal srid byed 'di dag la byin no/ / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bya 'di dag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba lags pas/ rgyal srid phyed kyis 'di dag la ci bgyi/ 'di dag
99a4('dul ba): 'od ma'i tshal gang du gnas pa der 'di dag gi gnas bca' 'o/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ skyed mos tshal re 'od ma'i rmil gyis yongs su bskor te/ blon po rnams
99a5('dul ba): kyis de rnams kyi gnas 'od ma'i tshal gyi nye 'khor du bcas pas/ de 'od ma'i tshil bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zhang po kun tu 'tshe
99a6('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung nas/ des skyed mos tshal de de'i gnas kyi phyir byin no// ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / rgyal po'i khab tu byon
99a7('dul ba): nas shing zhig gi drung na bzhugs so/ / ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas shing
99b1('dul ba): zhig gi drung du bzhugs so zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos rgyal po'i khyab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
99b2('dul ba): phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sa ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po
99b3('dul ba): bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad// yang
99b4('dul ba): dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par
99b5('dul ba): rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / / de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po snyan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das
99b6('dul ba): gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu gdugs
99b7('dul ba): chod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
100a1('dul ba): po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las
100a2('dul ba): langs te song ngo / / de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag stan gon byas nas/ nang par sngar langs
100a3('dul ba): gdan bshams nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/
100a4('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnapas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar
100a5('dul ba): te/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas ma
100a6('dul ba): ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi
100a7('dul ba): lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gsol zin
100b1('dul ba): nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa 'dir bcom ldan 'das ci bde bar bzhugs shig
100b2('dul ba): ces bcom ldan 'das la skyed mos tshal de phul lo/ / de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde rnams kyi nang du/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan
100b3('dul ba): ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs so zhes gdags par byas so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas na bzhugs so// rgyal po'i khab na khyim
100b4('dul ba): bdag cig gnas pa des/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rang gi khyim du spyan drangs so// yang de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dgos pa
100b5('dul ba): 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de khyim bdag de'i khyim du nub mo brang btab bo// de nas khyim bdag de de nyid kyi mtshan mo langs te/ nang mi rnams la bsgo
100b6('dul ba): ba nang rje dag longs shig/ bzhin bzangs dag longs shig/ shing rnams gshogs shig/ me dag bus shig/ 'bras chan tshes shig/ sran
100b7('dul ba): tshod chos shig/ bca' ba dag bzang du gyis shig/ bkang sa'i zhal da dag gyis shig/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ ci khyim bdag 'di
101a1('dul ba): bag ma len nam/ bag ma gtong ngam/ yul mi 'am/ chong pa 'am/ tshogs sam/ 'khor ram/ 'dis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal
101a2('dul ba): bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po sang khyim du gdugs chod la spyan drangs sam snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag khyod ci bgam
101a3('dul ba): len nam/ bag ma gtong ngam/ phul mi 'am/ tshong pa 'am/ tshogs sam/ 'khor ram/ khyod kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
101a4('dul ba): gzugs can snying po sang khyim du gdugs chod la spyan drangs sam/ khyim bdag kho bo bag ma len pa 'am/ bag ma gtong ba yang ma yin/ yul mi ma yin/
101a5('dul ba): tshong pa ma yin/ tshogs pa ma yin// 'khor ma yin/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang gdugs chod la spyan drangs pa ma yin te/ 'on
101a6('dul ba): kyang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs chod la spyan drangs so/ / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i snga sngon ma thos
101a7('dul ba): pa thos pa dang / ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas de spu zing zhes byed pas khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag sangs rgyas zhes
101b1('dul ba): bya ba 'di su yin/ khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u tam shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las sA dang kha spu bregs de gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
101b2('dul ba): khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ khyim bdag de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//
101b3('dul ba): khyim bdag dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'di su yin/ khyim bdag rgyal rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim
101b4('dul ba): nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod do/ / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs las kyang rigs
101b5('dul ba): kyi bu dag sA dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smri ga bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba dag yod de/
101b6('dul ba): khyim bdag de ni dge 'dun zhes bya ba yin te// sang kho bo'i khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de gdugs chod la spyan drangs so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das
101b7('dul ba): de da ltar gang na bzhugs rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid kyi dur khrod kyi bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/ / khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis ltar rung ngam/ khyim
102a1('dul ba): bdag de'i phyir khyod re zhig sdod cig dang / gal te bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid du gshegs pa dang / sang khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa
102a2('dul ba): de yod do/ / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas nyal lo// de nam ma langs par nam langs pa'i 'du shes kyis lho sgo gang na ba der song
102a3('dul ba): ba dang / de'i tshe lho sgo thun gnyis la sgo phye nas 'jog ste/ thun dang po la ni pho nya glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams mi thogs par bya ba'i phyir phye ste 'jog go// thun tha ma la ni po
102a4('dul ba): nya 'gro bar chas pa rnams mi thogs par bya ba'i phyir phye ste 'jog go/ / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems de/ 'di ltar lho sgo phye ste 'dug pas gdon mi
102a5('dul ba): za bar nam langs so snyam du rig nas/ snang ba de nyid du grong khyer nas byung ba dang / de byung ma thag tu snang ba gang yin pa de med nas/ slar mun nag por gyur to// de
102a6('dul ba): 'jigs par gyur/ bag tsha bar gyur cing / spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ bdag mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ g.yon can 'ga' zhig gis gtses
102a7('dul ba): par mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams nas/ slar ldog par 'dod pa dang / de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des ci tsam lho phyogs kyi sgo nas/ bsil
102b1('dul ba): ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod kyi bar thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig/
102b2('dul ba): slar ma ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi/ slar log na ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rta brgya dang ni gser rgyan brgya// dre'u'i shing rta brgya
102b3('dul ba): dang ni/ / sna tshogs nor gyis spur ba yi// na rgod ma yi shing rta brgya// gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// khyim bdag spyan sngar song
102b4('dul ba): zhig/ slar ma ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi/ slar log na ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gangs can ri yi glang chen brgya// gser
102b5('dul ba): dang nor bus brgyan byas la/ / lus che ga shol mda'i mche bar ldan// ma tang ga skyes stod po che// gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// khyim
102b6('dul ba): bdag spyan sngar song zhig/ slar ma ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi/ slar log na ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tho gar yul gyi bu mo brgya/
102b7('dul ba): nor bu'i rna cha gdub kor thogs// gser gyi dpung rgyan thogs pa yi// mgrin pa rgyan gyis legs brgyan pa// gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi// bcu drug char yang mi phod do//
103a1('dul ba): khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig/ slar ma ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi/ slar log na ni ma yin no// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas
103a2('dul ba): sbyin gyis/ lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ khyim bdag kho bo ni khyod kyi grogs po rnying pa bram ze'i khye'u sbrang rtsi'i bu pho yin te/ kho bos dge slong shA
103a3('dul ba): ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis la sems dad pa bskyed nas shi ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes te/ lho sgo 'di nyid na gnyug mar gnas so// de'i phyir
103a4('dul ba): khyod la kho bo 'di skad ces khyim bdag spyan sngar song zhig/ sAr ma ldog cig/ khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi/ slar log na ni ma yin no zhes smra'o// de nas khyim bdag
103a5('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ skye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing / chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin no/ da ltar bcom ldan
103a6('dul ba): 'das de la blta bar lha yang brtson par byed do snyam du bsams nas/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na 'chag
103a7('dul ba): cing / lhag par yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'ong ba la gzhes so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdan
103b1('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ yang dag par dgyes par 'gyur bas yang dag par dgyes par byed de/ bcom ldan 'das cig bde bar mnal lam// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
103b2('dul ba): bcad de bka' stsal pa/ / gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos la// bag med rab tu rnam grol ba// mya ngan yongs 'das bram ze ni// thams cad du ni bde bar mnal// 'dir ni re ba kun
103b3('dul ba): bcas nas/ / thugs kyi rims nad rnams bsal zhing // zhi ba thob pa'i thugs kyis na// nye bar zhi ba bde bar mnal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin khrin
103b4('dul ba): nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/
103b5('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du
103b6('dul ba): bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa de 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang /
103b7('dul ba): tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams ma nog chung ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i phan
104a1('dul ba): yon gyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan to/ / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i
104a2('dul ba): sems dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan zhing yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa kun shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi
104a3('dul ba): chos bshad pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam rgyas par rab tu bstan to// dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa chen rtsi
104a4('dul ba): 'os pa'i nang du bcug na chen rtsi legs par 'dzin du btub pa de bzhin du/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang /
104a5('dul ba): kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting sleb pa dang / som nyi las
104a6('dul ba): rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
104a7('dul ba): gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so//
104b1('dul ba): bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon
104b2('dul ba): bar dad lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod kyi ming ci/ btsun pa bdag gi ming za sa sbyin lags mod kyi/ bdag mgon
104b3('dul ba): mchis pa rnams la 'tshal ma stsol bas/ des na bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bgyi bar skye bos 'tshal to// khyim bdag khyod kyi gnas gang yin/ btsun pa yul pra tsi na zhes bgyi ba na ko sa la rnams kyi
104b4('dul ba): grong khyer mnyan yod ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de na bdag mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs shig dang / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i /
104b5('dul ba): bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi lags so// khyim bdag mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang yod dam/
104b6('dul ba): btsun pa ma mchis lags so// khyim bdag gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der dge slong rnams 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas par sems so// bcom ldan 'das gshegs shig dang / bdag gis ci nas
104b7('dul ba): kyang mnyan yod du dge slong rnams mchis pa dang / gzhan du mchi ba dang / mchi bar sems par 'gyur ba de ltar gtsug lag khang brtsigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
105a1('dul ba): la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mge
105a2('dul ba): bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // des rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba dang bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de thams cad byas shing bsgrubs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
105a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
105a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi grogs dge slong gcig stsal du gsol/ de dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong su zhig khyim
105a5('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur snyam nas/ dge slong shA ri'i bus 'dul bar gzigs nas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis//
105a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshe gA la soms shig/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra
105a7('dul ba): bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan
105b1('dul ba): ba shA ri'i bu de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi
105b2('dul ba): bya ba byas nas/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te/ gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa mkhos su phab nas/ de lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon
105b3('dul ba): med zas sbyin lam brgyags mang po khyer nas/ nub mo nub mo zhing mnyan yod du song ste phyin nas/ de mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal
105b4('dul ba): dang na gos tshal nas nags tshal du/ 'chags nas 'chag sar dpyod cing 'di skad ces smras so// mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la/ ha cang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin par khang long nyung zhing / ku co chung ba dang /
105b5('dul ba): mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa chung ba'i sa'i phyogs gang na yod pa der/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag Shang
105b6('dul ba): brtsig na/ sa phyogs de gang na yod snyam pa las/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba ni mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring la/ da cang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin par yang khang
105b7('dul ba): long nyung zhing / ku co nyung ba dang / mtshan mo bcom chung ba dang / spra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sema? te/
106a1('dul ba): 'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ de rang gi khyim du ma song ba nyid du/ gzhon nu rgyal byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di
106a2('dul ba): skad ces smras so/ / gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba bdag la stsol cig/ der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so// des smras pa/ khyim bdag de ni nga'i kun dga' ra ba ni ma yin
106a3('dul ba): te/ skyed mos tshal yin mod kyi/ de nga'i yin no// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lan gnyis lan gsum du/ yang gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu bdag la kun dga' ra ba
106a4('dul ba): stsol cig/ bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags so// khyim bdag kun dga' ra ba de gser bye ba gshibs kyang nga mi gtong ngo // / 'dul ba gzhi//
106a5('dul ba): / bam po dgu bcu pa// yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis// gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin thang bkum
106a6('dul ba): lags kyis/ dbyig dang gser ba zhes shig/ kun dga' ra ba ni bdag gi lags so// rin thang sus bcad/ khyod kyis rin thang bkum mod/ de gnyis rin thang bcad do// rin thang ma bcad
106a7('dul ba): do zhes rtsod par gyur nas/ zhal che gcod pa'i mi gangan ba der dong ba dang / bar skabs der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
106b1('dul ba): kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtson gyis/ / de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas/ de nas zhal che gcod pa'i mir bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas dgos pa'i phyir 'dus so// khyim bdag mgon med
106b2('dul ba): zas sprin dang / gzhon nu rgyal byed gnyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i drung du song nas/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i rnams
106b3('dul ba): la don de rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba ni rin thang bcad zin gyis// gser long zhig/ kun dga' ra ba ni khyim bdag gi yin no// de cang mi smra bar
106b4('dul ba): 'dug go/ / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rta dang / rgya dang / gze ba dang / rnga mo dang / glang dang / bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te 'ongs nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
106b5('dul ba): thams cad gshib pa ra brtsams pa dang / sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma yog pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug go// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar
106b6('dul ba): 'dug ste/ gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas/ slar yang sba bar mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ngu yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam pa dang / gzhon nu/
106b7('dul ba): rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin ni gdon mi za bar ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung po chen po 'di snyed yongs su gtang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so snyam du bsams nas/
107a1('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag gal te khyod 'gyod pa skyes na gser slar long zhig/ kun dga' ra ba ni nga nyid kyi yin no// gnon
107a2('dul ba): nu bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te/ 'on kyang don 'di sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug pa ni/ bdag gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkab nas/ slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos
107a3('dul ba): pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam mo// de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog ma yin pa
107a4('dul ba): ma yin zhing / chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la da ltar khyim bdag 'di kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung po 'di snyed yongs su gtong ngo snyam du bsams nas/ khyim
107a5('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces so/ / khyim bdag ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la sbyin cig/ der kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag
107a6('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs byin nas/ der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig tu bcug go// de nas khyim bdag
107a7('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtsams pa dang / mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas slong ba'i yid can rnams 'dus nas/ khyim
107b1('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lpags pa dang / spras pa/ khyim bdag khyod dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma rtsig cig/ ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong khyer bgos te/
107b2('dul ba): dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i ni rgyal po'i khab yin no// kho bo cag gi ni mnyan yod yin no// des smras pa/ khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos kyi/ bdag gi nor ma bgos pas/ gang la mngon
107b3('dul ba): bar dga' ba de'i chos kyi phung po brtsig go/ de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba dang / der yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang / mu stegs spyi brtol can mu cor smra ba
107b4('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dga' dgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog gcig 'ongs nas/ gal te de'i gshags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/
107b5('dul ba): gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig/ des smras pa/ rung gis re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag go// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
107b6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
107b7('dul ba): ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa shA ri'i bu mu stegs can rnams 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod dga' dgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyen thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas/
108a1('dul ba): gal te de'i gshegs kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig ces mchi na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam
108a2('dul ba): pa ci 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med ces bsams pa las yod par mthong ngo // su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na bdag kho na la'o// yang bsams pa/
108a3('dul ba): ci 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan yang tshig gis 'dul ba yod snyam pa las yod pa mthong ngo // dus ji srid kyis tshogs par 'gyur
108a4('dul ba): snyam na/ zhag bdun lon nas so// bsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' ba dang
108a5('dul ba): mgu ba skyes nas/ mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu na re/ de bzhin du bya ste/
108a6('dul ba): 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o zhes zer ro// de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di la rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te/ yang na ni de 'bros 'dod do// yang na ni de phyogs tshol lo// de ma
108a7('dul ba): yin na dus der gdab ci dgos bdag cag kyang phyogs btsal lo zhes de rnams phyogs btsal bar brtsams te/ de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang / kun tu rgyu mig dmar mthong nas/ de la re
108b1('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gis brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na de phyogs tshol gyis/
108b2('dul ba): khyod kyang bdag cag gi grogs gyis shig/ dus ji tsam zhig na/ 'di nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par ro// rung gis de bzhin du bya ste/ gang gi tshe khyed cag 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig/
108b3('dul ba): mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang / sems khral skyes nas/ nyin re zhing phyogs tshol ba dang / nyi ma bgrang bar byed do// ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas
108b4('dul ba): sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa phyog la yangs par stan shom du bcug go/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ched du yang seng ge'i khri bshams so// yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams dang
108b5('dul ba): mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ngo mtshar skyes kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus so//
108b6('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi 'khor dang bcas pas mdun du bdar te/ rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas te/ 'dzum pa sngon
108b7('dul ba): du btang nas spyod lam zhi bas seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug go/ / 'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng bar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la rtog cing 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
109a1('dul ba): mu stegs can rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci re zhig byed dam/ 'on te 'jig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis byas/ khyod kyis shig cig
109a2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis byas na 'jig rten lnga dang bcas pas kyang 'jig par mi nus na/ kun tu rgyu mig dmar gyis lha smos kyang ci dgos snyam du rig nas
109a3('dul ba): kun tu rgyu mig dmar la 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyod kyis byos shig/ ngas gzhig go// de mig 'phrul byang ba yin pas/ des shing sa ha ka ra shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang
109a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rlung dang cha re drag po phab ste/ / des de rtsa ba nas phyung nas phan tshun du rnam par gtor te/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis yul du yang ma gyur to// de nas des pad+ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang po
109a5('dul ba): che bzang po zhig sprul nas/ des kun tu rnal nas ming gi lhag ma tsam zhig bzhag go// des sbrul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus nam mkha' lding zhig sprul te/ des
109a6('dul ba): de blangs so/ / des ro langs shig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pas btab pa las/ nyes par spyad pa'i ro langs ni bdag nyid la gsod par byed pas/ des de nyid
109a7('dul ba): bsnyags pa dang / de nas de 'jigs smag 'phongs shing ba spu zing zhes byed nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu skyabs su mchi lags kyis/
109b1('dul ba): yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dang / ro langs de zhi bar gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de la chos bshad de/ de dad pa skyes nas
109b2('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan
109b3('dul ba): sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas/ gdams ngag byin te/ des brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsab
109b4('dul ba): ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du
109b5('dul ba): mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing / rig pa dang / mngon par
109b6('dul ba): shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par
109b7('dul ba): bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te smras pa/
110a1('dul ba): 'phags pa shA ri'i bus ni/ smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po tshar bcad do snyam du rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
110a2('dul ba): 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so so yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas so//
110a3('dul ba): de thos pas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/ kha cig gis
110a4('dul ba): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blangs/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/
110a5('dul ba): kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa
110a6('dul ba): mngon sum du byas so/ / 'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba/ chos la 'bab pa/ dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do// mu stegs can rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag
110a7('dul ba): cag gis 'di gshags kyis tshar gcad par mi nus kyis/ thabs shig bsham par byas la/ de nas glags rnyed nas/ 'di bsgags te gsad par bya'o snyam nas/ thams cad 'dus te/
110b1('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du dong ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad ni bcad pas/ de bas snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag/
110b2('dul ba): khang du gla mi'i las bya'o// kho bo cag 'di ni ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo // khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag
110b3('dul ba): go zhes/ de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa mu stegs can rnams kyi mchid nas/ khyod kyis kho bo
110b4('dul ba): cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad pas na snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o// kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo zhes
110b5('dul ba): mchi'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bsam pa la zhugs te/ ci 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med snyam na/ des yod par mthong ngo // su zhig la rag lus snyam na/
110b6('dul ba): bdag kho na la'o snyam nas/ des bsams te smras pa/ khyim bdag de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ de rnams gtsug lag khang der gla ma'i las byed par brtsams pa na
110b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcag thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas/ des de rnams las byed du gzhug par brtsams so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas
111a1('dul ba): de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na 'chag cing 'dug pa de/ de rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ dben pa na 'dug pas 'di gsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas//
111a2('dul ba): de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong ste bskor nas 'dug go// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 'di rnams bsam pa ci 'dra bas bdag gi drung du 'ongs snyam na/ ji tsam na gsad pa'i sems kyis
111a3('dul ba): yin par shes nas/ des lcag thogs sprul pa de rbad nas/ des de rnams las byos deng zhes thag bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu yongs su bskyab tu gsol/
111a4('dul ba): des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa re zhig song la ngal sor chug cig/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni 'di gsad par bsams na/ 'di
111a5('dul ba): ni bdag cag la byams par sems so snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes
111a6('dul ba): nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas te/ de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes
111a7('dul ba): bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba
111b1('dul ba): dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams rab tu phyung / bsnyen
111b2('dul ba): bar rdzogs par byas nas/ gdams ngag byin te/ de rnams kyis brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal bar byas pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/
111b3('dul ba): 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom
111b4('dul ba): pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du tshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
111b5('dul ba): tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang /
111b6('dul ba): bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
111b7('dul ba): shA ri'i bus gtsug lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung / mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum dbyung bar brtsam
112a1('dul ba): so/ / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med
112a2('dul ba): par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ khyim bdag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs
112a3('dul ba): pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag mgon med
112a4('dul ba): zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad de smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ga la de lta na de'i slad du yang thig sku brkyang dang lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang
112a5('dul ba): thig skud de gzung ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad bar byas te/ dad pa de'i mjug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa rin po che sna
112a6('dul ba): bzhi las byas par gyur nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang
112a7('dul ba): chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu brtsig tu bcug ste/ de gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu brtsigs nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/ tshe dang ldan
112b1('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs na/ shul so ji tsam du byon par 'gyur/ khyim
112b2('dul ba): bdag dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tsam mo/ / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i lam du
112b3('dul ba): 'gro'o/ / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs dgongs brtsis nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug/ sprin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du
112b4('dul ba): bcug/ dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis brgyan tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag nye bar bkod/ rta babs
112b5('dul ba): dag byed du bcug/ dus kyi dang thun chod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go// de ltar tshogs bsogs nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje tshur spyon khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la/
112b6('dul ba): son pa dang kho bo'i tshig gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang
112b7('dul ba): bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/ bdag ji sri
113a1('dul ba): 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / spun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes kyang gsol
113a2('dul ba): cig/ jo bo bka' bzhin tshal zhes mi des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi lhar mnyan nas/ rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to// de nas lam gyis
113a3('dul ba): dub pa ngal bsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
113a4('dul ba): 'dug nas mi des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la zhabs gnyis la/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya
113a5('dul ba): ba nas/ reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kye mo khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas
113a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang
113a7('dul ba): gzims cha dang / spun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid do zhes mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas mi ri bcom ldan
113b1('dul ba): 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/
113b2('dul ba): 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba/ 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba/ 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor
113b3('dul ba): dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa/ 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che'i mchog
113b4('dul ba): glang po che phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshig
113b5('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba sgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od gzer
113b6('dul ba): stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor
113b7('dul ba): ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag bzangs ris lA ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshigs kyis bskor/
114a1('dul ba): ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mcho ga yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar
114a2('dul ba): dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas
114a3('dul ba): pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od gzer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
114a4('dul ba): ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod
114a5('dul ba): na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / lnga brgya stong phrag du mas zham 'bring byas nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs
114a6('dul ba): nas mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/
114a7('dul ba): kun tu rab tug yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mthon/ nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon/ shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mthon/
114b1('dul ba): byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mthon/ lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mthon/ dbus dma'/ dbus mthon/ mtha' dma' bar gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi
114b2('dul ba): bar dang bcas te/ snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// bar snang la yang lha'i rnga rdung zhing / nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lngas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang
114b3('dul ba): pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gur kum gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog
114b4('dul ba): man da ra ba rnams 'thor zhing / lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di dag dang / gzhan yang ngo mtshar de lta bu dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang
114b5('dul ba): dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to/ / dma' ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to// mthon po rnams mnyam par gyur to// glang po che yang skad 'byin/ rta yang skad 'byin/ khyu mchog rnams kyang
114b6('dul ba): sang 'byin no/ / khyim na yod pa'i rol mo cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin no// long ba rnams kyis mig ni mig gis mthong ngo // 'on pa rnams kyis ni rnabs thos so// lkugs
114b7('dul ba): pa rnams kyis ni smra nus par gyur to/ / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po rnams yongs su tshang bar gyur to// chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to// dug 'thungs pa rnam
115a1('dul ba): ni dug zhi bar gyur to/ / phan tshun khon byung ba rnams ni byang bar gyur to// snum pa rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to// btson du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las thar
115a2('dul ba): ro/ / nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed par gyur to// de dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti
115a3('dul ba): chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs so/ / gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
115a4('dul ba): mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun sbreng bar brtsams pa las/ de 'dzag tu ma btub pas khyim bdag mgon med zas
115a5('dul ba): sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa/ bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa
115a6('dul ba): dang bcas pa cung zad kyang byas pa med do/ / 'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di nyid phul ba yin gyis/ phyogs gzhan zhig
115a7('dul ba): tu 'dug la sbrengs shig/ des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad de
115b1('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad pa na/ gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thug
115b2('dul ba): kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi sems mkhyen nas/ dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no zhes der ming thog mar smos pa mdzad do// gzhon nu rgyal
115b3('dul ba): byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas/ shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs las bcom ldan 'das kyi
115b4('dul ba): phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go/ / de bzhin du gnas brtan sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
115b5('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / zhes gdags pa byas so// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan
115b6('dul ba): yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ shes ldan go'u ta ma de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag
115b7('dul ba): nyid zhal gyis 'che'o zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par
116a1('dul ba): mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom
116a2('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / kye go'u ta ma bdag gis shes ldan go'u ta ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'cha'o/
116a3('dul ba): zhes thos lags na/ go'u ta ma gang dag de skad ces lung ston pa de dag cig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa 'debs pa ma lags sam/ thal bar smra ba ma lags sam/ shes ldan go'u ta mas gsung
116a4('dul ba): pa bzhin smra ba lags sam/ chos smra ba lags sam/ chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam/ cig de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun par rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa
116a5('dul ba): mchis na/ smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur lags sam/ rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du smra ba de dag ni de skad du lung ston pa bden te/ ngal skur pa 'debs pa ma yin/ thal bar
116a6('dul ba): smra ba ma yin/ de ni gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin/ chos smra ba yin/ chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/ de dag gi zung du pha rol po chos dang mthun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa
116a7('dul ba): 'ongs na smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas so// shes ldan go'u ta ma de
116b1('dul ba): skad gsung mod kyi/ shes ldan go'u ta ma la bdag yid mi ches lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kye go'u ta ma re zhig rgan zhing rgan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze ni 'di dag lags te/ 'di lta ste/
116b2('dul ba): 'od srungs rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi pha ma skra'i la ba can dang / ka ta'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu gnyen
116b3('dul ba): gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang / da dung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid g.yar gyis mi 'che lags na/ shes ldan go'u ta ba
116b4('dul ba): 'khrungs nas ring po ma lags pa/ gsar du rab tu byung bas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu bzhi po 'di dag la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis gnon par
116b5('dul ba): mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis gnon par mi bya'o// rgyal po chen po sbrul gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par
116b6('dul ba): mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis gnon par mi bya'o// rgyal po chen po me chung ngu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ chung ngu la zil gyis gnon par mi bya'o// rgyal po dge slong gzhon nu la khyad dugs
116b7('dul ba): par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis gnon par mi bya'o// rgyal po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong gzhon nur gyur kyang / de rdzu phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i dgra bcom par 'gyur ro// bcom
117a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas ni/ bde gshegs kyis de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/ smon pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs// rgyal rigs dpe byung
117a2('dul ba): ldan pa dang / rigs btsun grags par ldan pa la// blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes// khyad du mi gsang zil mi gnon// rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis// rgyal srid dag na thob
117a3('dul ba): gyur nas/ / chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod// de bas de la shin tu gdud// de ltar rang gi srog bsrung zhing // rang gi don la lta bas ni// de ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la
117a4('dul ba): legs par bag kyang bya/ / gal te grong ngam dgon pa'ang rung // gang du sbrul ni mthong gyur na// blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes// de khyad mi gsang zil mi gnon// 'di ltar sprul
117a5('dul ba): ni rgyu ba na/ rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la// glags rnyed nas ni gzhon nus kyang // skyes pa bud med du ma zin// de ltas rang gi srog bsrung zhing // rang gi don la lta bas ni//
117a6('dul ba): de ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// mang po sreg cing 'bar byed pa// lam gnag bsreg bya za ba'i me// blo dang ldan pas de chung zhes// khyad du mi gsad zil
117a7('dul ba): mi gnon/ / me ni chung ngur gyur pa yang // rkyen la chen por gyur pa yin// mes ni ring por mi thogs par// grong rdal dang ri grong khyer sreg/ de ltar rang gi srog bsrung zhing // rang
117b1('dul ba): gi don la lta bas ni/ / de ni khyad du migasad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// lam nag bsreg bya za ba'i mes// nags tshal bsregs pa gang yin de// zhag 'das nas ni
117b2('dul ba): 'ga' zhig tu/ / 'dab ma rnams ni skye 'gyur gyi// dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa la// brten nas gang zhig tshig gyur pa// de la bu tsha yod min pas// bgo skal spyod pa thob mi
117b3('dul ba): 'gyur/ / ta la'i mgo ni bcad pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs rabs kyang 'chad// de bas rang gi srog bsrung zhing // rang gi don la lta bas ni// de ni khyad du mi gsad cing //
117b4('dul ba): de la legs par bag kyang bya// rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang // de bzhin brang 'gro me dang ni// dge slong tshul khrims ldan de la// blo dang ldan pas brnyas mi bya// de bas
117b5('dul ba): rang gi srog bsrung zhing / / rang gi don la lta bas ni// de la khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis
117b6('dul ba): gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas
117b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bkur ba
118a1('dul ba): lnga dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ / khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes springs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bon
118a2('dul ba): btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo / / gnyis pa btang ba dang / de yang de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu
118a3('dul ba): byung bar gyur to/ / rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu phyung ngo snyam nas/ sems
118a4('dul ba): khongs su chud cing 'dug pa/ 'char khas mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du khyod phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char kha gang gi tshe gzhon
118a5('dul ba): nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe/ kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho bo sa gan du 'ongs nas/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis
118a6('dul ba): bzhugs so zhes smra'o/ / da ni kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi gtad na 'ga' yang 'phrin khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ 'char khas smras pa/ lha bdag
118a7('dul ba): mchi ste bka' bzhin 'tshal nas slar mchi'o/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char kha gang dang gang song ba de de'i ston pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas// de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na/
118b1('dul ba): de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do// 'char khas smras pa/ lha slar mchi lags so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis 'phrin yig bris pa/ lhums su zhugs
118b2('dul ba): ba bzung nas su/ / khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te// nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du// rgyal po ljon shing la bsdad na// da ni khyod kyi slob ma yi// yal ga lcug ma 'phel gyur pas//
118b3('dul ba): gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar gyur// bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan// gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na// bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun
118b4('dul ba): bskrun te/ / bu cig yul mis 'bras bu yongs su spyod thob na// de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med// gang tshe thog ma bltams pa na// nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams
118b5('dul ba): ni/ / shin tu che thang phan gdags zhes// khyod kyi dam bca' mdzad nas ni// khyod kyis zhi gnas de brnyed na// bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la// thugs brtse rjes su zung mdzod de//
118b6('dul ba): gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol// zhes spring ba'i yi ge 'char khas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang
118b7('dul ba): na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa'i yi ge lags so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas bklags
119a1('dul ba): so/ / bklags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang / 'char khas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
119a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ 'char kha 'dong ngo // 'char kha sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas/ de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dang /
119a3('dul ba): bdag gi mthus bkri bar bkyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgyal por ma chags shing // sred 'gas bkri ba yod
119a4('dul ba): pa ma yin pa'i/ / sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing // sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i//
119a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing // 'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa// sangs rgyas spyod
119a6('dul ba): yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de/ / gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing // 'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa// sangs rgyas mtha'
119a7('dul ba): yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de/ / gzhi med na ni gang gi sa gzhi yis bkri// lan la spobs pa med nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang la
119b1('dul ba): rig par bgyi'o/ / 'char kha sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// 'char khas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis/ khyod kyang rab tu
119b2('dul ba): byung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char kha rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas
119b3('dul ba): pa bzhin du gyis shig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang / yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lha
119b4('dul ba): bu rnams kyi chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog go/ / 'char khas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
119b5('dul ba): kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char kha 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung zhig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal
119b6('dul ba): zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char kha rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas/
119b7('dul ba): 'char kha 'di ni khyod kyis bya ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud med dang ldan gcig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba dag go// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char khas tshe dang ldan pa
120a1('dul ba): shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag/
120a2('dul ba): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char kha song la khyod do mod
120a3('dul ba): kho nar rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgo na sdod la/ shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te nang du spyod cig ces gleng na 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas gal te shAkya'i
120a4('dul ba): dge slong gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer na/ yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri na/ 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di
120a5('dul ba): 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ / khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par mi bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes gleng na/ mi bzhugs
120a6('dul ba): so zhes brjod par bya'o/ / kal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'drin/ dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dzin/ rgyal ba
120a7('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris de bstan par bya'o/ / gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'drin/ byon no zhes brjod par bya'o// ji srid cig na byon zhes 'drin/ zhag
120b1('dul ba): bdun lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ / des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song zhig/ sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te/
120b2('dul ba): lha rnams bsams pas grub 'gyur zhing // de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyi// sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha de ji ltar skad cig/
120b3('dul ba): de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir son pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha bcom ldan 'das la dad pa mi bzad pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/ shes
120b4('dul ba): ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do// de rnams kyis/ rgyal
120b5('dul ba): bo la smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du thong zhig/ de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'char kha rab tu byung ngam/ des
120b6('dul ba): smras pa/ lha rab tu byung ngo // khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa ma yin nam/ 'di ci yin/ 'char khas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no bka'
120b7('dul ba): stsal nas/ chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi/ bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo // rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud nas stan bsham
121a1('dul ba): pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste/ de'i don du chu brtags pa gtsang ma dang / 'bras bu brtags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go// tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang /
121a2('dul ba): dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing / ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin yongs su longs spyod do// rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/ 'char kha ci gzhon nu don thams cad
121a3('dul ba): grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba yin nam/ 'char khas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so// dper ji lta bu/ ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no// rgya
121a4('dul ba): mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no/ / nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no// nam mkha' dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i bu kha bzhin no// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char kha gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa
121a5('dul ba): yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am/ lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o// rgyal po zas gtsang brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar byung ste smras pa/ 'char
121a6('dul ba): kha gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam/ 'char khas smras pa/ byon no// dus ji srid cig na/ dgung bdun lon na'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan
121a7('dul ba): dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis/ rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang byi dor gyis shig/ 'char khas smras pa/ lnga bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do//
121b1('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/ gang du bzhugs/ 'char khas smras pa/ dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang du'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char kha gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan
121b2('dul ba): ba 'char khas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to/ / de nas rgyal pos/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa
121b3('dul ba): gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu brtsig tu chug cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la mnyan nas/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu
121b4('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu brtsig tu bcug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka'
121b5('dul ba): stsal to/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu song la/ dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan 'jom na/ khyed cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos long zhig
121b6('dul ba): ces sgo zhig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das
121b7('dul ba): ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan 'dzem na/ khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long zhig ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor dul ba/
122a1('dul ba): zhi ba/ 'khor zhib/ grol ba/ 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor
122a2('dul ba): dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa/ 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po che phrug gu'i
122a3('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram
122a4('dul ba): ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo ru pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan 'thon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta
122a5('dul ba): buded dpon tsheng pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs
122a6('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od gzer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po zul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig
122a7('dul ba): mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos sras gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum
122b1('dul ba): cu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshitshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho ga yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin tshwa dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam brlags pa dang /
122b2('dul ba): bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ spu skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras
122b3('dul ba): ba/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od gzer stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'grob lngar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
122b4('dul ba): ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 'bab chu ro hi kar byon no// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gan
122b5('dul ba): nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro hi kar byon no zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma rnams bsal nas/
122b6('dul ba): tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri shin tu zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ka nas/ gang yang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba
122b7('dul ba): de'i bar gyi lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go// de nas 'bab chu ro hi ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed
123a1('dul ba): do/ / kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed do// kha cig ni khrus byed do// ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so
123a2('dul ba): zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha cig ni pha mtshan skyes nas/ thams cad n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/ ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag
123a3('dul ba): byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa blta'o snyam mo// // 'dul ba gzhi// // bam po go gcig pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das
123a4('dul ba): 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te nga zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na/ shAkya nga rgyal can rnams/ kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi nags su gshegs nas/
123a5('dul ba): ldong po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lnga brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te dus de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas/ bdud rtsi thob nas de zhabs kyis
123a6('dul ba): gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/
123a7('dul ba): spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba mdzad do// ma'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad do//
123b1('dul ba): me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar
123b2('dul ba): po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go// cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/ sku ri smad nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par
123b3('dul ba): mdzad do/ / sku'i stod nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang / nub
123b4('dul ba): dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsdus te/ ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so//
123b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid
123b6('dul ba): tsam na'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o//
123b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni/ dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o//
124a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan
124a2('dul ba): 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam
124a3('dul ba): na ni dge slong rnams mi gang lhag tsam na'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams sa la'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang / dge slong mang po mthong
124a4('dul ba): nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kha la smras pa/ 'char kha 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na/ de la gzhon
124a5('dul ba): nu gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char khas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/ 'di na bcom ldan 'das lags srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags// 'di ni nyon mongs
124a6('dul ba): sel mdzad nyid byed de nyid don ni kun tu ston mdzad lags/ / 'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/ dri med gsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod
124a7('dul ba): kyi sras lags mi dbang da gzigs shig/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te/ tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/
124b1('dul ba): kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te// bltams pa'i tshe nas ni g.yos pa dang // 'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o// nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis/ rgyal po zas
124b2('dul ba): gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa mthong nas/ da ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci tha tshig cis ma dad pa bskyed do// rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams
124b3('dul ba): la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so/ / shes ldan dag da gdod kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa
124b4('dul ba): bltams pa na sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/ 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun gnag smag tu gyur pa/ nyi ma dang
124b5('dul ba): zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang / de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ der sems can gang dag
124b6('dul ba): skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/ shes ldan 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta
124b7('dul ba): zhes po shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang / kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so// gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhing las kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na
125a1('dul ba): shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/
125a2('dul ba): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na/ shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar
